entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
